jobDescription: What sets Bank of the West apart from other banks is our team membersthey embody the optimistic spirit of the West. There is a spirit here that drives us to do more. Job Description Summary Responsible for coordinating the successful delivery of complex Data Governance initiatives involving significant internal and/or external resources within Enterprise Data Management of corporate Finance. Programs include Data Governance working groups and management committees, Data Quality, lineage, and definition projects and assessments; Exercises great latitude in managing the initiation, planning, execution, controlling, and closing processes on projects. Develops business as usual processes to turn projects into operations. Essential Job Functions Oversees the development and implementation of detailed project and work plans for efforts within the data governance organization. Oversees the planning, documenting and execution activities for the projects; along with tasks, budgets, timelines, and project staffing to successfully complete projects on a timely basis and within budget. Develops documentation to support the project planning and implementation process. Oversees a portfolio of activities and resources across data governance, quality, and lineage subject areas. Facilitates and provides subject matter expertise within data governance working groups and management committee. Leads and provides support to project teams by facilitation/attending project meetings, responding to assigned tasks when due. Advises on milestones as needed for reporting to appropriate management levels and communicates budget and status milestones as defined for the projects. Recognizes project issues and concerns requiring resolution in a timely and professional manner and addresses them with management and appropriate staff members. Education Bachelor's Degree Work Experience P4 - 7 yrs Requires deep knowledge of job area typically obtained through advanced education combined with experience. Typically viewed as a specialist within discipline. May have broad knowledge of project management.  Requires 7 years minimum prior relevant experience. Equal Employment Opportunity Policy
